column1: Smoque BBQ////St. Louis Ribs took a small 1 pt dive. Maybe it's because it's not new anymore
column2: I don't know. 8 is still very respectable; problem is
column3: I don't think I'll ever crave Smoque for it. The rib meat itself is great
column4: but I don't want to have JUST ribs
column6: and if the rib meat is good
column8: then it just crapsizes the whole experience.
